name: EmailToAscii
author: Benoit Gilloz

sections.description: Replace any email address in the content by theire ascii translation in order to avoid spam bots. The plugin is just a simple search and replace function hooked to a wordpress filter. No back end, no db, no mess.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the unziped folder into your plugin folder (/wp-content/plugins/)
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. That’s it.

short_description: EmailToAscii replaces email addresses in the content (post or page) by their ascii translation in order to avoid spam bots.
description: Replace any email address in the content by theire ascii translation in order to avoid spam bots. The plugin is just a simple search and replace function hooked to a wordpress filter. No back end, no db, no mess.
